content.rendered:
Want to know more about your best friend? Below are twenty-five questions that you can ask him or her. You can print this page if you like, or copy and paste any or all of it and send it as part of an email. If you like, you can share some of the answers that you get.

If you were a cheese, what kind of cheese would you be?

What is one candy that you regret eating/not eating?

What is your favorite episode of “I Love Lucy”?

Who is your favorite actress in the 2013 movie “Gravity”?

Which do you prefer: pizza wedges or squares?

If you were alone on a desert island, who would you want to have with you?

Why are dogs man’s best friend?

Who is woman’s best friend?

If I were a book, would you read me?

What is your favorite song from the medieval period?

If you were put in a dungeon, who would you want to have with you?

Which app would you use if you could only have one?

If I were nominated to be president of your fan club, would you vote for me?

Between 0 and 1,000,000,000,000, what are your favorite and least favorite numbers?

If you wrote my name, would you use a pen or a pencil?

If you could be in an episode of The Simpsons”, which one would it be?

How do you picture me as an emoji?

Can you describe all of your best qualities in one word?

If you had to choose between taking my call/text and winning a million dollars, which would you choose?

If I asked you 21 questions, would that be too many?

Which planet would you not visit and why?

If I asked you to be quiet, would you still talk to me?

Did you know that friend spelled backwards is dneirf?

If I were to ask you just one more question, what should it be?
